src:
Na meji s Slovenijo ujeli narko šefa, njegova reakcija pa ...
Veliki diler iz BiH se je skrival v prtljažniku.
07 Nov 2019, 09:21 by N. Č.
BREGANA – Na hrvaški strani mejnega prehoda Obrežje so v ponedeljek zjutraj policisti ustavili avtomobil znamke BMW z bosanskimi registrskimi oznakami, ki je iz Hrvaške nameraval vstopiti v Slovenijo. Ko so odprli prtljažnik avtomobila, so imeli kaj videti.V prtljažniku se je skrival narko šef iz BiH, piše Jutarni list. Za nekaj kosi prtljage, stisnjen v prtljažniku, se je policistom v obraz smejal čokati Edin Kametović, imenovan Dlaka (38). Po pisanju časnika gre za dilerja iz BiH, za katerim je Italija razpisala evropsko tiralico zaradi obtožb, da je bil eden od šefov zločinske organizacije, ki je v Italiji prodajala heroin, kokain, marihuano, amfetamine ...Kametović je osumljen, da je bil del organizirane 23-članske kriminalne skupine, ki sta jo v začetku lanskega leta razbili italijanska in slovenska policija ob sodelovanju s hrvaškim notranjim ministrstvom.
text:
On the border with Slovenia, they caught the boss's drug, and his reaction ...
A big BiH dealer was hiding in the trunk.
07 Nov 2019, 09:21 by N. Č.
BREGANA - On Monday morning, police stopped a BMW car with Bosnian registration plates on the Croatian side of the Obrezje border crossing, intending to enter Slovenia from Croatia. When they opened the trunk of the car, they had something to look at. A narcotics boss from BiH was hiding in the trunk, writes Jutarni List. For a few pieces of luggage, squeezed in the trunk, Edin Kametovic, nicknamed "Coat" (38), laughed at the officers in the face. According to the newspaper, it is a dealer from Bosnia and Herzegovina, which Italy has announced a European arrest warrant for alleging that he was one of the heads of a criminal organization that sold heroin, cocaine, marijuana, amphetamines in Italy ... Kametovic is suspected of being part of an organized 23-member criminal group that was broken up by Italian and Slovenian police earlier this year in cooperation with the Croatian Interior Ministry.
